docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: For a minute there, as the latest cholesterol controversy began to rage, you may have thought: ''I knew it all along. How can something as wonderful as steak and eggs, pumpkin pie and ice cream, sausage and gravy, really be bad for me?'' Maybe at Thanksgiving dinner you went overboard on foods rich in fats and cholesterol just to prove you wouldn't keel over with a coronary on the spot.
